hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Clear Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Scale#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Zora Tunic# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #6# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Megaton Hammer# and #a Green Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #an Ocarina#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Heart Piece Room

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Fire Temple#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #4# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: I hear Termina is a great spot for a vacation!

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #0# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Scale#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Fire Temple#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #King Dodongo# holds...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Game Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #time#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say Ganondorf knows where to find the instrument of his doom.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a small #Fairy Fountain#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Epona's Song# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.
